question:
Match Column - X with Column - Y and select the correct answer using the codes given below the list:

Column - X (Leader)
1. Lala Lajpat Rai
2. Chittaranjan Das
3. Amar Besant

Column - Y (Role in Freedom Movement)
I. Proponent of home rule movement in India
II. Leader of the Punjab National Movement
III. Founder-leader of the Swaraj party

Choose the Correct Option:
A) I-III, 2-I, 3-II
B) 1-I, 2-II, 3-III
C) 1-III, 2-II, 3-I
D) 1-II, 2-III, 3-I
explanation: Correct matching: 1. Lala Lajpat Rai - Leader of the Punjab National Movement (II), 2. Chittaranjan Das - Founder-leader of the Swaraj party (III), 3. Amar Besant - Proponent of home rule movement in India (I)

question:
Which of the following are part of the Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council of India?

Members:
I. Cabinet Ministers of Union Government
II. Union Finance Minister
III. Union Minister of State in charge of Revenue or Finance
IV. The Minister in charge of Finance for each state or any minister nominated by the state government

Choose the correct option:
A) I, II, and III
B) I, II, and IV
C) II, III, and IV
D) I, II, III and IV
options: D) I, II, III and IV
explanation: The GST Council consists of the Union Finance Minister (II), Union Minister of State in charge of Revenue or Finance (III), and the Minister in charge of Finance for each state or any minister nominated by the state government (IV). Cabinet Ministers of Union Government (I) are not specifically part of the GST Council structure.
